name: 3D FPS - The Dying Crubs
description:
This is my 3D FPS project.

Game instructions : 

For level 3 you have to kill the 2 bosses for the key to appear.

Use the WASD keys to make the player move. 

Modification:

  1.  Added level 3.
  2.  I created a new map.
  3. I modified the levels done in the lecture.
  4.  I added new enemies (boss).
  5.  Adjusted the Speed of the player in level 3.
  6. I change the in-game music.   
  7. I added land mines
  8. The boss has double the life of the regular boss.

Credits:

Created by Daniel Naor
